item.title: 消息人士称，以 Blackstone 为首的财团接近达成 135 亿美元收购 AirTrunk 的交易
item.description: 一位知情人士周一表示，以 Blackstone 为首的财团即将达成以 200 亿澳元（135.3 亿美元）（包括债务）收购澳大利亚数据中心集团 AirTrunk 的交易。【原文：A consortium led by Blackstone is nearing a deal to acquire Australian data centre group AirTrunk for A$20 billion ($13.53 billion) including debt, a person with knowledge of the situation said on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚零售商伍尔沃斯在分拆三年后退出奋进集团
item.description: 澳大利亚零售商伍尔沃斯（Woolworths）已决定退出酒类连锁店丹-墨菲（Dan Murphy's）和 BWS 瓶装酒商店的所有者，结束了与奋进集团（Endeavour Group）的长期合作关系。【原文：Australian retailer Woolworths has decided to exit the owner of liquor store chain Dan Murphy's and BWS bottle shops, ending its long-standing relationship with Endeavour Group , about three years after spinning it off.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧洲央行决策者对经济下滑的影响意见不一
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）的政策制定者们对经济增长前景的看法越来越不一致，这一分歧可能会影响数月来的降息辩论，一些政策制定者担心经济衰退，而另一些政策制定者则关注挥之不去的通胀压力。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers are increasingly at odds on the outlook for growth, a rift that could shape the rate cut debate for months with some fearing a recession and others focusing on lingering inflation pressures, sources close to the debate said.】

item.title: 瑞郎利差交易充满避险反弹风险
item.description: 随着投资者转向瑞士法郎，将其作为日本日元套利交易的替代品，瑞士法郎快速反弹的风险始终存在。【原文：As investors turn to the Swiss franc as an alternative to Japan's yen to fund carry trades, the risk of the currency staging one of its rapid rallies remains ever present.】

item.title: 早间竞标预测薪资水平
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 中国监管机构审查阿里巴巴期间的主要事件
item.description: 中国国家市场监督管理总局（SAMR）周五表示，阿里巴巴集团在 2021 年因垄断行为被处以创纪录的 27.5 亿美元罚款后，已完成了为期三年的 "整改"。【原文：China's State Administration of Market Regulation (SAMR) said on Friday that Alibaba Group had completed three years "rectification" following a record $2.75 billion fine levied in 2021 for monopolistic practices.】

item.title: 印尼 8 月通胀率保持在央行设定的范围内
item.description: 印尼官方数据周一显示，印尼8月份的年通胀率为2.12%，与7月份的2.13%基本持平，控制在央行的目标范围内，符合市场预期。【原文：Indonesia's annual inflation rate was 2.12% in August, essentially unchanged from 2.13% in July, official data showed on Monday, holding comfortably within the central bank's target range and matching market expectations.】

item.title: 中国经济改善，亚洲工厂出现初步复苏迹象
item.description: 周一的民间调查显示，包括中国制造业在内的亚洲工厂在8月份出现了暂时复苏的迹象，芯片制造商也从坚挺的需求中获益，但经济逆风依然存在。【原文：Asian factories, including China's manufacturing sector, showed signs of a tentative recovery in August and chip makers benefitted from firm demand, private surveys showed on Monday, but economic headwinds loom.】

item.title: 与 Airtel 达成协议后，苹果将在印度展开音乐、电视流媒体之战
item.description: 苹果公司与印度第二大电信公司的合作将为这家 iPhone 制造商在内容市场上带来急需的推动力，而苹果公司在这一市场上远远落后于 Spotify 和迪斯尼等公司。【原文：Apple's partnership with India's second-biggest telecoms firm will give the iPhone maker a sorely needed boost in a content market where it lags far behind the likes of Spotify and Walt Disney .】

item.title: 预计亏损 26 亿美元，香港新世界发展股价暴跌
item.description: 香港大型房地产开发商新世界发展（New World Development）估计截至 6 月的财政年度净亏损高达 200 亿港元（26 亿美元），股价暴跌 14%。【原文：Shares of New World Development , a major property developer in Hong Kong, plunged 14% after it estimated a net loss of as much as HK$20 billion ($2.6 billion) for the financial year ended in June.】

item.title: 明星娱乐公司因未能按时提交财务业绩而股票停牌
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所周一表示，赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 因未按期提交财务业绩而暂停股票上市。【原文：Shares of casino operator Star Entertainment are suspended from quotation for not lodging its finanical results by the due date, the Australian bourse operator said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国薪资数据即将公布，美元兑欧元升至两周高点
item.description: 美元兑欧元周一攀升至两周最高点，原因是交易商减少了对美联储激进宽松政策的押注，现在的焦点已转移到本周末至关重要的美国就业报告上。【原文：The dollar climbed to a two-week top against the euro on Monday as traders pared bets for aggressive policy easing by the Federal Reserve with the focus now moving to a crucial U.S. jobs report at the end of this week.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 REA 集团考虑收购英国 Rightmove 公司
item.description: 澳大利亚房地产公司 REA Group 周一表示，正在考虑通过现金加股票的方式收购在伦敦上市的同行 Rightmove。【原文：Australian real estate firm REA Group said on Monday it is considering acquiring London-listed peer Rightmove via a possible cash and share offer.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本工厂活动萎缩速度放缓
item.description: 周一的一项私营部门调查显示，得益于产出和新订单的复苏，日本 8 月份工厂活动的收缩速度有所放缓，这为正在起步的经济带来了一些希望。【原文：Japan's factory activity contracted at a slower pace in August thanks to a recovery in output and new orders, a private-sector survey showed on Monday, offering some hope for an economy that is starting to find its feet.】

item.title: 韩国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，即使海外需求放缓，韩国工厂活动仍在加速增长
item.description: 周一的一项民间调查显示，尽管海外需求放缓，但韩国 8 月份的工厂活动增长加快，产出以三年多来最快的速度增长。【原文：South Korea's factory activity growth quickened in August, as output expanded at the fastest pace in more than three years despite a slowdown in overseas demand, a private survey showed on Monday.】

item.title: 欧佩克+供应增加的前景令石油跌幅扩大
item.description: 油价周一延续跌势，投资者正在权衡欧佩克+10月份产量的增加与利比亚产量的大幅下降，而中国和美国这两个全球最大的石油消费国的需求疲软。【原文：Oil prices extended losses on Monday with investors weighing higher OPEC+ production from October against a sharp drop in output from Libya amid sluggish demand in China and the U.S., the world's two biggest oil consumers.】

item.title: 亚洲股市持稳，美元在就业测试前保持坚挺
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市开局平淡，因为投资者正准备迎接数据密集的一周，美国就业报告可能决定本月预期的降息是常规还是超大规模。【原文：Asian share markets got off to a quiet start on Monday as investors braced for a data-packed week culminating in a U.S. jobs report that could decide whether a rate cut expected this month will be regular or super-sized.】

item.title: 迪士尼与 DirecTV 未能达成发行协议
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼公司和卫星电视供应商 DirecTV 周日表示，双方没有就 ESPN、ABC 和其他迪斯尼旗下电视网达成新的分销协议。【原文：Walt Disney and satellite TV provider DirecTV did not reach a new distribution deal for ESPN, ABC and other Disney-owned networks, the companies said on Sunday.】

item.title: 新的非生产性力量：中国青年拥有自己的失业问题
item.description: 去年 8 月，何艾君因中国打击私人家教而退出教育行业，如今他找到了一个不太可能的第二职业--失业影响者。【原文：After quitting the education industry last August due to China's crackdown on private tutoring, He Ajun has found an unlikely second life as an unemployment influencer.】

item.title: 早间新闻中国为全球 "黄金时代 "前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，英特尔首席执行官将向董事会提出削减资产和成本的计划
item.description: 英特尔正在经历其最糟糕的时期之一，因为它正试图在人工智能时代迎头赶上英伟达（Nvidia）等公司。【原文：Intel is suffering through one of its worst periods as it tries to play catchup in the AI era against companies such as Nvidia.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院法官将于周一就 X 禁令进行表决
item.description: 巴西最高法院的一个五人合议庭将于周一投票决定是否维持亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）法官关闭该国社交媒体平台 X 的裁决。【原文：A five-member panel of Brazil's Supreme Court will vote on Monday whether to uphold Justice Alexandre de Moraes' ruling to shut down social media platform X in the country.】

item.title: 西方遏制迫在眉睫，中国将向非洲领导人推介绿色技术出口
item.description: 中国将敦促本周在北京举行的 50 个非洲国家峰会在西方国家对其出口产品（如电动汽车和太阳能电池板）实施限制之前，接受更多的中国商品，以换取更多的贷款和投资承诺。【原文：China will urge a summit of 50 African nations in Beijing this week to take more of its goods, before Western curbs kick in on its exports such as electric vehicles and solar panels, in exchange for more pledges of loans and investment.】

item.title: 调查显示，8月份中国新房价格涨势放缓
item.description: 周日的一项民间调查显示，8月份中国新房价格涨幅放缓，受危机影响的房地产行业在一系列扶持政策之后正努力寻找底部。【原文：Prices of new homes in China rose at slower pace in August, a private survey showed on Sunday, as the crisis-hit property sector struggles to find its bottom after a slew of supportive policies.】

item.title: 韩国出口连续第 11 个月增长，但增速放缓
item.description: 韩国 8 月份出口连续第 11 个月增长，但增长速度低于上个月和市场预期，原因是计算机芯片需求放缓，而汽车销售依然低迷。【原文：South Korea's exports rose an 11th straight month in August, but the pace of growth was weaker than the previous month and market expectations as demand for computer chips slowed, while auto sales remained sluggish.】

item.title: 美国监管机构称福特将因发动机气门问题召回90736辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周六表示，福特将召回90736辆汽车，因为这些汽车的发动机进气阀可能在行驶过程中破裂。【原文：Ford will recall 90,736 vehicles as engine intake valves in the vehicles may break while driving, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Saturday.】

item.title: 硅谷银行中方合作伙伴收购合资企业股份
item.description: 中国金融监管部门周五晚些时候表示，硅谷银行在中国的合资企业将成为上海浦东发展银行的全资子公司，并获准更名为上海创新银行。【原文：Silicon Valley Bank's Chinese joint venture will become a wholly owned unit of Shanghai Pudong Development Bank, following approval to change its name to Shanghai Innovation Bank, a Chinese financial regulator said late on Friday.】

item.title: Artisan 敦促 Seven&i 在 9 月 19 日前更新收购要约
item.description: 美国基金 Artisan Partners Asset Management 加大了对日本 Seven and i 控股公司的压力，要求董事会在 9 月 19 日前就加拿大 Alimetation Couche-Tard (ACT) 公司的收购要约提供最新信息。【原文：U.S. fund Artisan Partners Asset Management ramped up pressure on Japan's Seven and i holdings , calling on the board to provide an update on a takeover bid from Canada's Alimetation Couche-Tard (ACT) by Sept. 19.】

item.title: 中国 8 月制造业下滑至 6 个月低点
item.description: 周六的一项官方工厂调查显示，中国制造业在8月份放缓至六个月低点，这使人们更加期待决策者将公布新的计划，加大对家庭的刺激力度，减少对基础设施项目的刺激。【原文：China's manufacturing slowed to a six-month low in August, an official factory survey showed on Saturday, raising expectations policymakers will unveil fresh plans to direct more stimulus to households and less to infrastructure projects.】

item.title: 加州发布自动驾驶卡车运营法规草案
item.description: 加利福尼亚州机动车辆管理局周五发布了关于自动驾驶汽车在高速公路上行驶的法规草案，为自动驾驶卡车开始长途运输铺平了道路。【原文：The California Department of Motor Vehicles on Friday issued draft regulations on the operation of autonomous vehicles on highways, paving the way for self-driving trucks to commence long-haul deliveries.】
